titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to provide for relief in civil actions for violations of the protections on credit extended to members of the Armed Forces and their dependents.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: 5/21/2012--Introduced. Provides civil relief for violations of the protections on consumer credit extended to members of the Armed Forces and their dependents, including actual and punitive damages as well as equitable and declaratory relief.
